object.name: Audio
object.description: This object represents an audio file to be treated as music by the Telegram clients.
object.html_description: This object represents an audio file to be treated as music by the Telegram clients.
object.rst_description: This object represents an audio file to be treated as music by the Telegram clients.

annotations.description: Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file
annotations.html_description: Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file
annotations.rst_description: Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file
annotations.name: file_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots. Can't be used to download or reuse the file.
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots. Can't be used to download or reuse the file.
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots. Can't be used to download or reuse the file.
annotations.name: file_unique_id

annotations.description: Duration of the audio in seconds as defined by sender
annotations.html_description: Duration of the audio in seconds as defined by sender
annotations.rst_description: Duration of the audio in seconds as defined by sender
annotations.name: duration

annotations.description: Performer of the audio as defined by sender or by audio tags
annotations.html_description: Optional. Performer of the audio as defined by sender or by audio tags
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Performer of the audio as defined by sender or by audio tags
annotations.name: performer

annotations.description: Title of the audio as defined by sender or by audio tags
annotations.html_description: Optional. Title of the audio as defined by sender or by audio tags
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Title of the audio as defined by sender or by audio tags
annotations.name: title

annotations.description: Original filename as defined by sender
annotations.html_description: Optional. Original filename as defined by sender
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Original filename as defined by sender
annotations.name: file_name

annotations.description: MIME type of the file as defined by sender
annotations.html_description: Optional. MIME type of the file as defined by sender
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. MIME type of the file as defined by sender
annotations.name: mime_type

annotations.description: File size in bytes. It can be bigger than 2^31 and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a signed 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this value.
annotations.html_description: Optional. File size in bytes. It can be bigger than 2^31 and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a signed 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this value.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. File size in bytes. It can be bigger than 2^31 and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a signed 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this value.
annotations.name: file_size

annotations.description: Thumbnail of the album cover to which the music file belongs
annotations.html_description: Optional. Thumbnail of the album cover to which the music file belongs
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Thumbnail of the album cover to which the music file belongs
annotations.name: thumbnail
